original_title: 戦慄怪奇ファイル コワすぎ！ FILE-01 口裂け女捕獲作戦
overview: New mocumentary series from auteur Koji Shiraishi. POV style depiction of a TV crew as they cover the urban legend of "Kuchisake-Onna" or "Slit-Mouthed Woman". Director Kudo (Osako Shigeo), assistant director Ichikawa (Kuboyama Chika) and cameraman Tashiro (Shiraishi) work at a video production company, and are sent amateur footage of a supposed sighting. This leads them down a path of treacherous investigation and inventive experiments.
title: Senritsu Kaiki File Kowasugi! File 01 - Operation Capture the Slit-Mouthed Woman
